name: The Mansion : Original Stuff
detailed_description:
This download consists of the original VN Maker program, project and script (both as a text and yWriter 7 file).

The VN Maker is very slow to transition through screens, so be patient !
about_the_game:
This download consists of the original VN Maker program, project and script (both as a text and yWriter 7 file).

The VN Maker is very slow to transition through screens, so be patient !
short_description: The original VN Maker of the game, along with script and project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 Upwards
  • Processor: Any x64 processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any x64 processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c or better
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
